data.name: Metadata_desc_dcContributor
data.value: A party whose contribution to the publication is secondary to those named in dc:Creator

data.name: Metadata_desc_dcCoverage
data.value: The extent or scope of the content of the resource

data.name: Metadata_desc_dcCreator
data.value: Names of primary author or creator of the intellectual content of the publication

data.name: Metadata_desc_dcDate
data.value: Date of publication of the DTB

data.name: Metadata_desc_dcDescription
data.value: Plain text describing the publication's content

data.name: Metadata_desc_dcFormat
data.value: The standard or specification to which the DTB was produced

data.name: Metadata_desc_dcIdentifier
data.value: A string or number identifying the DTB

data.name: Metadata_desc_dcLanguage
data.value: Language of the content of the publication

data.name: Metadata_desc_dcPublisher
data.value: The agency responsible for making the DTB available

data.name: Metadata_desc_dcRelation
data.value: A reference to a related resource

data.name: Metadata_desc_dcRights
data.value: Information about rights held in and over the DTB

data.name: Metadata_desc_dcSource
data.value: A reference to a resource (e.g., a print original, ebook, etc.) from which the DTB is derived. Best practice is to use the ISBN when available.

data.name: Metadata_desc_dcSubject
data.value: The topic of the content of the publication

data.name: Metadata_desc_dcTitle
data.value: The title of the DTB, including any subtitles

data.name: Metadata_desc_dcType
data.value: The nature of the content of the DTB (recommended are Dublin Core keywords "audio", "text", and "image")

data.name: Metadata_desc_dtbAudioFormat
data.value: The format in which the audio files in the DTB file set are written

data.name: Metadata_desc_dtbMultimediaContent
data.value: Summary of the general types of media used in the content of this DTB

data.name: Metadata_desc_dtbMultimediaType
data.value: One of the six types of DTB defined in the Structure Guidelines

data.name: Metadata_desc_dtbNarrator
data.value: Name of the person whose recorded voice is embodied in the DTB

data.name: Metadata_desc_dtbookXsltFallback
data.value: The fallback XSLT file

data.name: Metadata_desc_dtbProducedDate
data.value: Date of first generation of the complete DTB, i.e. production completion date

data.name: Metadata_desc_dtbProducer
data.value: Name of the organization/production unit that created the DTB

data.name: Metadata_desc_dtbRevision
data.value: Non-negative integer value of the specific version of the DTB. Incremented each time the DTB is revised.

data.name: Metadata_desc_dtbRevisionDate
data.value: Date associated with the specific dtb:revision

data.name: Metadata_desc_dtbRevisionDescription
data.value: The changes introduced in a specific dtb:revision

data.name: Metadata_desc_dtbSourceDate
data.value: Date of publication of the resource (e.g., a print original, ebook, etc.) from which the DTB is derived

data.name: Metadata_desc_dtbSourceEdition
data.value: A string describing the edition of the resource (e.g., a print original, ebook, etc.) from which the DTB is derived

data.name: Metadata_desc_dtbSourcePublisher
data.value: The agency responsible for making available the resource (e.g., a print original, ebook, etc.) from which the DTB is derived

data.name: Metadata_desc_dtbSourceRights
data.value: Information about rights held in and over the resource (e.g., a print original, ebook, etc.) from which the DTB is derived

data.name: Metadata_desc_dtbSourceTitle
data.value: The title of the resource (e.g., a print original, ebook, etc.) from which the DTB is derived. To be used only if different from dc:Title

data.name: Metadata_desc_dtbTotalTime
data.value: Total playing time of all SMIL files comprising the content of the DTB

data.name: Metadata_desc_unrecognized
data.value: A custom metadata item

data.name: Metadata_desc_z3986ExtensionVersion
data.value: The version of the extension to the core Z39.86 specification
